attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned ask government to allow workers of any background to use the union jack or st georges flag and not class it as a racist act, reports of black and asian and white e.t.c. council workers wearing as head scarfs for dreads or flying from vans is being dismissed and classed as upsetting locals. when has supporting britain been a racist issue. P-C madness got out of hand. The law does not stop radicals at march's wearing full face scarfs so why should all classes be stopped from supporting their country.
